I'm Aniket. I love to code, listen to music and I even write free-verses at times. A majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

4OH4

I got somethin' and it goes thumpin' like this
All you need is my Uhn Tiss Uhn Tiss Uhn Tiss
I got somethin' and it goes thumpin' like this
All you need is my Uhn Tiss Uhn Tiss Uhn Tiss

I wonder why you wanted the 4OH4. But now you got it.
